About Us

About Our Bakery

Welcome to our bakery! Every loaf, muffin, and roll is crafted with care and baked fresh daily. Our passion is creating delicious, wholesome bread that brings warmth and comfort to every table.

Our Story

Founded in 1987, our bakery started as a small family business with a big dream — to share the love of freshly made bread with our community. Over the years, we’ve grown, but our recipes and dedication to quality remain the same.

Our Promise

We use only the finest ingredients, sourced locally whenever possible. Each day, we rise early to prepare everything by hand — so that you can enjoy the perfect start to your day.

© 2025 My Bakery
